The term '''''Evendim ''''' may refer to:
* '''[[Evendim]]''', the [[Hobbitish]] name for the evening dusk.
*[[Lake Evendim|Evendim]], the [[Westron]] name for lake [[Nenuial]] ("Water of Twilight") in northern [[Eriador]].
* [[Hills of Evendim]], a series of hills in northern Eriador, around that lake.

{{Disambig}}
